item.title: 2020 Kaggle Survey
item.description:
2020 Kaggle Machine Learning & Data Science Survey My first Kaggle project using Python Questions: Gender differences (understanding them) Different skills by position Pay differences based on skills (tools, coding ability, languages) What oppotunities come from higer education What did people leave blank the most? This kernel is based on the Ken Jee’s Kaggle Project From Scratch. This is ment to replicate the steps done by Ken Jee on the Kaggle Project From Scratch series

EDA Plan of Attack High level understanding of data (look at columns, nulls, shape, etc) Understand how to work with different question types (Multiple answer vs single answer) Experiment with plotly basics px vs go (Not a Plotly Tutorial) Go through my process of learning to build more advanced graphs Start understanding the question “How do skills vary across roles”
